name: Ctrl-Alt-Delete
description:
A fun survival game for the GMTK Game Jam 2020.  

Controls (no pun intended):

- Press Ctrl to jump AND shoot towards the mouse or (re)start game
- Don't die to Alts, Deletes or by getting Out of Control(s)
- Pick up Ctrl packs to gain more Ctrls
- The more you play, the harder it gets
- Press Alt or Delete to quit

Music provided by Twin Musicom - Good for Nothing Safety.

P.S. Thanks for the game jam, this was my first participation in such an event, and I really enjoyed it! 

Any feedback is greatly appreciated.
